getPrepositionBeforeTerm

public java.lang.String getPrepositionBeforeTerm(Term t,
                                                 int sentNum)
return the preposition before a term t in sentence number sentNum, if any

Parameters:
t - the term, such as "Germany"
sentNum - the sentence number
Returns:
the preposition, such as "in"

outputFSC

@Deprecated
public void outputFSC()
Deprecated. 

Output preprocessed sentence to FSC format by tokens

This is the fsc.dtd: 

 <!ELEMENT fsc ( chart ) >
 <!ATTLIST fsc version NMTOKEN #REQUIRED >

 <!ELEMENT chart ( text, lattice ) >
 <!ATTLIST chart id CDATA #REQUIRED >

 <!ELEMENT text ( #PCDATA ) >

 <!ELEMENT lattice ( edge* ) >

 <!ATTLIST lattice final CDATA #REQUIRED >
 <!ATTLIST lattice init CDATA #REQUIRED >

 <!ELEMENT edge ( fs ) >
 <!ATTLIST edge source CDATA #REQUIRED >
 <!ATTLIST edge target CDATA #REQUIRED >

 <!ELEMENT fs ( f* ) >
 <!ATTLIST fs type CDATA #REQUIRED >

 <!ELEMENT f ( fs | str )* >
 <!ATTLIST f name CDATA #REQUIRED >
 <!ATTLIST f org ( list ) #IMPLIED >

 <!ELEMENT str ( #PCDATA ) >

outputFSCbyTerms

public void outputFSCbyTerms(java.io.OutputStream os,
                             boolean tokenPos)
Output preprocessed sentence to FSC format by terms. tokenPos controls whether to also output the POS tags of tokens. If set to false, then only output POS of terms. When sentences are highly possible to contain unknown words, set it to true so PET parses.

Parameters:
os - an output stream, could be a file, stdout, etc.
tokenPos - a boolean value.

getFSCbyTerms

public java.lang.String getFSCbyTerms(java.lang.String input,
                                      boolean tokenPos,
                                      boolean singleSentence)
This functions first calls preprocess() and then output FSC XML by terms.

Parameters:
input - a raw sentence
tokenPos - a boolean value, whether to also output the POS tags of tokens. If set to false, then only output POS of terms.
singleSentence - whether the input is a single sentence or not. If not, sentence detection is performed.
Returns:
a string representing FSC in XML
